title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - GenAI, Hold the Waste: How H2O Fixed Its Storage Bottleneck (STG204)
title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 生成式AI，消除浪费：H2O如何解决其存储瓶颈问题 (STG204)
abstract: Generative AI demands fast, flexible, and cost-efficient infrastructure. In this joint session, H2O.ai shares how they support rapid growth in AI workloads by leveraging Datafy’s autonomous storage scaling. As customer adoption of GenAI surged, so did block storage needs, along with cost and complexity. Learn how Datafy helped H2O.ai slash EBS waste, maintain performance, and scale seamlessly, all with zero downtime and near-instant deployment. Walk away with practical insights into architecting a resilient storage layer that adapts to unpredictable GenAI workloads without overprovisioning or firefighting. This presentation is brought to you by Datafy, an AWS Partner.
abstract_cn: 生成式AI需要快速、灵活且具有成本效益的基础设施。在这场联合会议中，H2O.ai分享了他们如何通过利用Datafy的自主存储扩展来支持AI工作负载的快速增长。随着客户对生成式AI采用的激增，块存储需求以及成本和复杂性也随之增加。了解Datafy如何帮助H2O.ai大幅削减EBS浪费、保持性能并实现无缝扩展，所有这些都在零停机时间和近乎即时部署的情况下完成。您将获得关于构建弹性存储层的实用见解，该存储层能够适应不可预测的生成式AI工作负载，而无需过度配置或救火式处理。本演讲由AWS合作伙伴Datafy提供。
